scripts.test: npm -w apps/web run test && npm -w packages/exports run test || true
scripts.db:migrate: psql "$DATABASE_URL" < supabase/schema.sql && psql "$DATABASE_URL" < supabase/triggers.sql && psql "$DATABASE_URL" < supabase/rls.sql
scripts.db:reset: psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c 'drop schema public cascade; create schema public;' && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
